description:
The executives don`t like Yukiko`s decision to possibly end the company`s partnership with ROSCO. Meanwhile, Joe and Sachio settle things once and for all.
Source: Funimation

titles.title: Kako no Haiboku wa Kouun no Kizashi to Tomo ni Aru
Las derrotas pasadas son acompanadas por senales de buena suerte
過去の敗北は幸運の兆しと共にある
